item.description:
Adobe Lightroom 2 is an amazing tool. As a pro it has cut my post production time in half.

In the workshop we will be covering How to:

import and catalog your image files
use the library for fast and effective editing
Use the develop tab to create the image you are looking for
Create your own styled preset to apply to mass amounts of images
Create a custom sideshow to send and share with clients
Print what you see in lightroom
Get your image galleries to the web

For more info on lightroom go to Adobe.com


If you do not have lightroom you can go to adobe and get a 30 day trial
item.name: Adobe Lightroom a must have tool for every photographer
